retailer.name: Sevenoaks Sound & Vision
retailer.description: Receive free UK delivery on eligible orders from one of the largest, most trusted independent Hi-Fi and AV specialists in the UK. Established in 1972, our focus has been providing excellent products, service and value to our customers for over 40 years.

product.title: Yamaha RX-V583 AV Receiver
product.description: 7.2-channel AV receiver supports advanced surround sound formats to make movies come alive.

product.title: KEF LS50 Speakers
product.description: An innovative concept inspired by the legendary LS3/5a, LS50 mini monitor speaker is designed to bring professional studio monitor concept into the home.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins DS3 Surround Speakers (Pair)
product.description: The DS3 is a wall-mounted Surround Speaker that can operate in what's called a dipole mode, to create an authentic all-enveloping effect of the auditorium in a large space.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 90 Speakers (Pair)
product.description: The original hi-fi mini monitor, and respected by all. The new Radius 90 continues to evolve, delivering a greater size-defying performance than ever before.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 200 Centre Speaker
product.description: The Radius 200 Centre-Channel Speaker is designed for rack or shelf mounting in a dedicated AV System and room.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 225 Speaker (Single)
product.description: The new slender Radius 225 is even slimmer than its predecessor. At just 65mm in depth, the 225 is the perfect match with today's ultra-thin displays.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 390 Sub Woofer
product.description: The new Monitor Audio Radius 390 Sub Woofer promises the astonishing low frequency resolution of the Radius 380 with the added depth, impact and control of a larger bass engine.

product.title: Rotel A12 Amplifier
product.description: Rotel’s A12 integrated amplifier offers impressive audio performance as well, but with slightly less output at 60-watts per channel.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins 683 S2 Speakers
product.description: The largest speaker in the 600 Series. This floorstander is ideal for audiophile stereo and home theatre applications in larger rooms, delivering serious performance and amazing value.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins 684 S2 Speakers
product.description: Room-filling sound without a room-filling speaker cabinet. Slimmer than ever before, the 684 S2 offers an amazing combination of floorstander power, audio performance and unbeatable value.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins 686 S2 Speakers
product.description: Small is beautiful. The 686 S2 is the most compact speaker in the series, but don’t underestimate its power and precision. That's thanks to a new Decoupled Double Dome tweeter and improved design.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins HTM61 S2 Centre Speaker
product.description: The perfect partner for the 683 S2 in a commanding home theatre system, this true three-way centre speaker features two 6.5-inch drivers, an FST midrange and a Decoupled Double Dome tweeter.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins HTM62 S2 Centre Speaker
product.description: Ideal at the centre of most home theatre systems, the HTM62 S2 is the smaller centre speaker that still excels at delivering power and precision.

product.title: Pro-Ject Tube Box DS Valve Phono Pre Amp (MM/MC)
product.description: The Pro-Ject Tube Box DS offers similar characteristics as the Tube Box S/E, but it also takes the sound performance and the feature-set to a whole other level when compared with its forebear.

product.title: Audiolab M-DAC DAC
product.description: Audiolab is proud to launch its new standalone Digital to Analogue Converter, the M-DAC! The M-DAC has a smart styling and solid build, with ample connectivity.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins PV1D Sub Woofer
product.description: The PV1D will change the way you view subwoofers. Not just because of its inherently stable curved form, but because its digital platform which extends performance and flexibility.

product.title: Cyrus X Power Power Amplifier
product.description: The X Power is the reference stereo power amplifier in the Cyrus series. Conservatively rated at 70 watts per channel into 8 ohms and upgradeable in stages to 140W mono (with PSX-R). The X Power is the perfect partner for the Cyrus X series pre amplifiers, the Pre Xvs and DAC XP or as an upgrade power amplifier for the Cyrus 8vs.

product.title: KEF R400b Sub Woofer
product.description: At just 31 inches square, the KEF R400b may be compact, yet it packs an incredible punch. With a reinforced and braced sealed cabinet, it houses twin 9-inch drivers powered by twin 250W class-D amps.

product.title: Grado SR80e Headphones
product.description: Grado has taken one of the world's most legendary headphones and made it even better. The SR80e has a new driver design, a new polymer housing, and a new cable.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 270 Speakers
product.description: Gorgeous looks allied to our award-winning speaker engineering allow the new Radius 270 to make an emphatic design statement in any room and in both music and AV Systems.

product.title: Cyrus Stream XP2 Streaming Music Player (With Preamp)
product.description: Cyrus' new updated v2 streamers now have the ability to decode the highest resolution 24 bit 192kHz files that are only just becoming available.

product.title: Arcam miniBlink Bluetooth DAC
product.description: Streaming high quality music from your favourite mobile device is now easy with the new miniBlink Bluetooth DAC.

product.title: Ruark Audio R1 MK3 Bluetooth Speaker + DAB/FM
product.description: The new Ruark R1 MK3 is the latest addition to the R1 family. It features Bluetooth, DAB, DAB+ ,FM tuner and a USB charging port.

product.title: Ruark Audio R2 MK3 Wireless Speaker System + DAB/FM
product.description: The new Ruark Audio R2 features aptX Bluetooth, Spotify Connect and internet radio. With built in Wifi you can stream music over your network too.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3010 Speakers
product.description: This ultra compact bookshelf speaker sets new standards for sonic performance in its class.

product.title: Naim Mu-so Wireless Speaker
product.description: Combining Naim’s expertise in streaming, amplification and loudspeaker technology, mu-so is the stage your music deserves, bringing you closer to the songs that inspire your life.

product.title: Sonos PLAYBAR Wall Mount Wall Mount Kit
product.description: A Wall Bracket / Mount Kit for the Sonos PLAYBAR.

product.title: Q Acoustics Media 4 (M4) Soundbar
product.description: The new Q Acoustics Media 4 is a high performance Soundbar designed to deliver high fidelity reproduction of music, and high quality audio from a TV or set top box, tablets and smartphones.

product.title: Ruark Audio MR1 Mk2 Bluetooth Speakers (Pair)
product.description: Perfect as computer speakers, ideal to use with a turntable and a fantastic way to improve the sound of your TV, MR1 Mk2 has been designed to fill your life and home with quality sound.

product.title: Technics SL-1200GR Direct Drive Turntable
product.description: Technics launches Grand Class SL-1200GR: Leading-edge Technologies Deliver Rich, Robust, Analogue Music in a New Standard Direct-Drive Turntable System

product.title: Grado SR325e Headphones
product.description: The top of the range Prestige Series Headphone. The new SR325e has a new driver and cable design.

product.title: Arcam SA20 Amplifier
product.description: Building on the performance level of the A29, The SA20 integrated amplifier uses our proprietary Class G technology.

product.title: KEF REFERENCE 4c Centre Speaker
product.description: REFERENCE 4C combines breathtaking sonic accuracy with spatial precision.

product.title: KEF REFERENCE 5 Speakers
product.description: REFERENCE 5 exemplifies the passion for innovation that underpins the Reference design philosophy.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins C5 S2 In-Ear Headphones
product.description: C5 Series 2 in-ear headphones bring you amazingly natural acoustics and fit so snugly you’ll hardly be aware you’re wearing them.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3020i Speakers
product.description: Substantial Standmount / Bookshelf Speakers with 125mm (5 in) and ?22mm (0.9 in) precision drivers, which can be shelf-mounted on compliant pre-fitted rubber feet, stand-mounted or wall-mounted on dedicated ?optional stands and brackets.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3060S Subwoofer
product.description: Accurate Centre Speaker with twin 100mm (4”) and 22mm (0.9”) precision drivers can be shelf or cabinet mounted on its compliant pre-fitted rubber feet or wall-mounted on optional, dedicate brackets.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3090Ci Centre Speaker
product.description: Accurate Centre Speaker with twin 100mm (4”) and 22mm (0.9”) precision drivers can be shelf or cabinet mounted on its compliant pre-fitted rubber feet or wall-mounted on optional, dedicate brackets.

product.title: LG OLED55C8 55" 4K UHD OLED TV
product.description: This LG OLED TV comes with Dolby Atmos Sound, Cinema HDR with Dolby Vision plus an elegant and streamlined Alpine stand that directs the Dolby Atmos sound straight towards you. This product is a fantastic step in to the next generation of television with ThinQ AI and our most intelligent TV brain ever - the a9 Processor.

product.title: NAD M12 Digital Pre Amplifier / DAC
product.description: The M12 is an ultra-high resolution digital audio hub that boasts a full roster of audiophile-grade features that leverage some of the most advanced digital audio thinking on earth.

product.title: Ruark Audio R4 MK3 Bluetooth Speaker System + CD + DAB/FM
product.description: With stunning sound and design the new R4 IMS is the perfect 'all in one' music solution for 21st century living. Ideal for modern day technophobes, simply plug in play!

product.title: Cyrus 8<sub>2</sub> DAC Amplifier / DAC
product.description: Cyrus amplifiers have an enviable reputation for their class leading sound quality corroborated by many international awards from the world’s press.

product.title: Cyrus Stereo 200 Power Amplifier
product.description: Stereo 200 is a high performance power amplifier incorporating a new and unique Cyrus topology that combines the benefits of high efficiency and lower heat generation from a digital output stage.

product.title: Sonos PLAYBAR Soundbar
product.description: The soundbar for music lovers. PLAYBAR's nine speaker design floods your home with huge waves of epic, full-theater sound for TV, movies, music and video games.

product.title: KEF R100 5.1 AV Speaker Package
product.description: KEF's R100 5.1 is a 5 Star What Hi -Fi? award winning AV speaker package

product.title: Cyrus Pre<sub>2</sub> DAC DAC Pre Amplifier
product.description: ThePre<sub>2</sub> DAC Qxoffers a sonic step up in performance from Cyrus' integrated amplifiers.

product.title: REL T-Zero Sub Woofer
product.description: For years, REL lovers have been asking for a smaller woofer for their smaller systems and small rooms; a no-compromise REL design with REL sonic qualities in a more compact package.

product.title: Pro-Ject Phono Box Phono Pre Amp (MM/MC)
product.description: Today, many amplifiers do not have a specific phono cartridge inputs. The Pro-Ject Phono Box is an ideal affordable solution for connecting a turntable up to your existing system and its also capable of working with both Moving Magnet and Moving Coil cartridges.

product.title: Naim NAP 100 Power Amplifier
product.description: TheNAP 100 is a classic expression of traditional Naim Power Amplifier engineering. Offering 50 watts per channel at 8 Ohms, and 75 watts at 4 Ohms, the NAP 100 is a dual mono design based on the circuit topology found in the SuperUniti reference AllI-In-One Player.

product.title: AudioQuest Jitterbug USB Noise Filter
product.description: Reduces the noise and ringing that plague both the data and power lines of USB ports.

product.title: Sonos PLAY:1 Wireless Speaker
product.description: The compact wireless speaker that delivers deep, crystal clear HiFi sound. PLAY:1 delivers rich, powerful sound, with crystal clear highs and deep, rolling lows for pitch-perfect HiFi music.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius 380 Sub Woofer
product.description: The new Radius 380 Sub Woofer will elevate your expectations of what's possible in a small enclosure: the Radius 380 and its companion Radius 390 rewrite the rules.

product.title: Monitor Audio Radius ONE 3 Channel Centre Speaker
product.description: The new Radius ONE from Monitor Audio takes over from the original Radius soundbar with a beefed up driver complement in a purer, acoustically-matched configuration.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins M-1 Satellite Speaker (Single)
product.description: Sleek, compact, yet packing a powerful punch, the M-1 satellite speaker can be used on its own, with a subwoofer in a 2.1 system, or as the backbone of a 5.1system.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3000 Cinema Pack 5.1 Speaker Package
product.description: Perfect for every occasion, the 3000 Series 5.1 Cinema Pack will unleash the full potential of your home cinema electronics.

product.title: Sony BDP-S6700 Blu-ray Player
product.description: 4K Upscale Blu-ray Disc Player with Wireless Multi-room, Bluetooth® and Dual Core Processor

product.title: Sennheiser MOMENTUM 2.0 AEBT Wireless Around-Ear Headphones (Black)
product.description: The new Sennheiser MOMENTUM Wireless lets you experience crystal-clear MOMENTUM sound without being attached to a cable.

product.title: Monitor Audio SB-3 Passive Soundbar
product.description: The SB-3 is custom-built for screen sizes above 60" and features three separate driver arrays for left, centre, right channels in a single cabinet.

product.title: AudioQuest DragonFly Black USB DAC / Headphone Amplifier
product.description: With DragonFly Black, any computer, laptop, tablet, or smartphone can be used as a true high-fidelity music player, allowing music lovers to enjoy beautiful sound wherever they go.

product.title: AudioQuest DragonFly Red USB DAC / Headphone Amplifier
product.description: With DragonFly Red, any computer, laptop, tablet, or smartphone can be used as a true high-fidelity music player, allowing music lovers to enjoy beautiful sound wherever they go.

product.description: HIFI FOR EVERY ROOM. The PULSE MINI delivers true HiFi to any nook and cranny of your home.

product.description: Uniti Core represents the essence of digital music. Rip & Store up to 100,000 tracks and serve them to Uniti all-in-one players.

product.title: Audiolab 8300CD CD Player
product.description: The 8300CD demonstrates a level of fine detail, transparency, soundstage depth, dynamic range and musical flow across all sources.

product.title: KEF EGG Bluetooth Speakers (Pair)
product.description: Streaming tracks wirelessly over Bluetooth aptX® or bringing your TV to life, the new EGG Wireless Digital Music System delivers pure, clear KEF quality sound.

product.title: Naim ND5 XS Streamer (Bluetooth)
product.description: Like the NDX, the ND5 XS is one of the most technically advanced and accomplished of all Naim products.

product.title: Bowers & Wilkins P3 S2 Headphones
product.description: Lightweight and foldable, providing size-defying bass and pristine detail.

product.title: Q Acoustics Concept 20 Speakers
product.description: The Concept 20 from Q Acoustics is a truly remarkable new loudspeaker which delivers a level of sonic performance previously only available to audiophiles able to invest in high-end models.

product.title: Q Acoustics Concept 40 Speakers
product.description: The Q Acoustics Concept 40 Floorstanding Speakers are the newest addition of the acclaimed award winning Concept range and they deliver unparalleled sonic performance at its price point.

product.title: Pro-Ject 2 Xperience SB DC Turntable
product.description: The 2 Xperience SB DC is the latest evolution of the 2 Xperience turntable from Pro-Ject.

product.title: KEF REFERENCE 1 Speakers
product.description: REFERENCE 1's innovative technology means that you don't need a big cabinet to enjoy expansive, premium, quality sound.

product.description: REFERENCE 3's three-dimensional soundstage places you right at the heart of the original performance.

product.title: KEF REFERENCE 8b Subwoofer
product.description: REFERENCE 8b delivers exceptional bass precision and control with zero distortion.

product.title: Sonos CONNECT:AMP Wireless Music Streamer / Amplifier
product.description: Turn your speakers into a music streaming system with our high-powered amplifier. Just attach CONNECT:AMP to your bookshelf, floor-standing, outdoor, or in-ceiling speakers.

product.title: NAD PP 2e Phono Pre Amplifier
product.description: The PP 2e Phono Pre Amplifier offers superb performance in a clean and simple package for a very reasonable cost.

product.title: Sonos CONNECT Wireless Music Streamer
product.description: Turn your stereo or home theatre into a music streaming system.

product.title: NAD M17 AV Preamplifier
product.description: The NAD M17 AV Surround Sound Preamp Processor has 7.1 balanced audio outputs and built in high-quality DACS.

product.title: KEF T305 AV Speaker Package
product.description: With a flat screen TV, you want speakers to match. Really flat. More importantly, you also want to fill the room with high definition 3D sound that's every bit as involving as what's on screen.

product.description: With a flat screen TV, you want speakers to match. Really flat. More importantly, you also want to fill the room with high definition 3D sound that's every bit as involving as what's on screen.

product.description: The compact SB-2 is engineered for seamless integration with 50"- 60" TVs, featuring three separate driver arrays for left, centre, right channels in a single cabinet.

product.title: Rega Planar 1 Turntable
product.description: Every single aspect of the Planar 1 has been meticulously designed to improve performance.

product.title: Yamaha YSP-5600 Digital Sound Projector
product.description: 3D sound reproduction equivalent to 7.1.2 channels realised using Yamaha’s unique Digital Sound Projector technology.

product.title: KEF MUO Portable Bluetooth Speaker
product.description: Designed by Ross Lovegrove and engineered by KEF, MUO is packed with innovative technologies to deliver uncompromised KEF quality sound when you’re streaming music wirelessly from a computer or mobile

product.title: Sonos PLAY:5 Wireless Speaker
product.description: The all-new PLAY:5 / The ultimate smart speaker for today's streaming universe.

product.title: Monitor Audio Bronze B5 AV Package

product.title: Rotel T11 FM/DAB+ Tuner
product.description: Rotel’s T11 is a high quality FM/DAB+ tuner with up to 30 station presets. It provides a wealth of free music listening options.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3020 Speakers
product.description: The new 3020 speaker benefits from the advanced, low distortion, wide dispersion, new 3000 Series Concentric Ring Dome tweeter; uprated ‘audiophile’ crossover and improved low resonance cabinet.

product.title: Naim Mu-so Qb Wireless Speaker
product.description: Naim Mu-so Qb is a compact wireless loudspeaker system. It combines Naim’s normal priorities of a highly enjoyable and engaging sound quality with dramatic but understated design and ease of use.

product.title: Sony VPL-HW65ES HD 3D SXRD Projector
product.description: Advanced SXRD panel technology delivers fabulous Full HD images with impressive 1800 lumens brightness and high 120,000:1 contrast ratio that always look clear and sharp, even in daylit living rooms.

product.title: Arcam irDAC-II DAC
product.description: The irDAC-II is designed to be the heart of a digital system and can be connected to a host of different types of digital sources and connections including asynchronous USB and Bluetooth.

product.title: Sony PS-HX500 USB Turntable
product.description: Breathe new life into analogue masterpieces with DSD. Just hook-up the PS-HX500 turntable to your PC via USB, play a record, and capture every aspect of the vinyl with DSD 5.6MHz native conversion.

product.title: Q Acoustics 3050 Speakers
product.description: The perfectly proportioned 3050 is the flagship of the new 3000 Series, it delivers truly unrivalled sound quality and value.

product.title: Pro-Ject 1 Xpression Carbon UKX Turntable
product.description: The 1 Xpression Carbon advances on from its forbears with some brand new features that have never been seen on any other Pro-Ject turntables before.

product.title: PMC Twenty5·23 Speakers (Pair)
product.description: The twenty5.23 takes the speed, transparency and sophistication of the twenty5.21 and adds greater bass extension and power.

product.title: Sony VPL-HW45ES HD 3D SXRD Projector
product.description: Expand your horizons beyond the TV screen - and create a spectacular cinematic experience in your own home.

product.description: Mid-sized Denon Envaya Mini - Water and dust proof Bluetooth speaker

product.title: Pro-Ject "The Classic" Turntable
product.description: To celebrate their 25 year anniversary, Pro-Ject Audio are combining traditional design with modern technology in a brand new turntable model.

product.description: Technics launches Grand Class SL-1210GR: Leading-edge Technologies Deliver Rich, Robust, Analogue Music in a New Standard Direct-Drive Turntable System

product.title: Sonos SUB Wireless Sub Woofer
product.description: Soul-shaking sound. Heart-pounding design. One-button setup. Fills an entire room with thick layers of deep, bottomless sound that lets you hear and feel every chord, kick, splash and roll.

product.title: Acoustic Energy AE1 Active Active Speakers
product.description: The AE1 Active is a two way standmount speaker with integrated class A/B amplification and fully active filter networks.

product.title: NAD PP 4 Digital Phono Preamp With USB Out
product.description: The NAD PP 4 Digital Phono Preamp With USB Out enables you to digitise your treasured vinyl collections to a PC or Mac. It features inputs for both MM (moving magnet) and low noise MC (moving coil) types for a wide variety of phono cartridges

product.title: Yamaha YSP-2700 Digital Sound Projector/Sub
product.description: Designed for exceptional sound quality to being out the best of beautiful images. Compatible with MusicCast, it offers a new music style.

product.title: Sony HT-ST5000 Dolby Atmos Soundbar/Sub
product.description: The Sony HT-ST5000 Dolby Atmos Soundbar with Subwoofer features 7.1.2 channels, Hi-Res Audio and wireless streaming. Google Chromecast and Spotify Connect come built into this soundbar.

product.title: Sony STR-DN1080 AV Receiver
product.description: Featuring flexible speaker solutions, DTS:X and Dolby Atmos support, the STR-DN1080 delivers mighty, cinematic surround sound that perfectly adapts to you, and your environment.

product.title: Sony UBP-X800 4K UHD Blu-ray Player
product.description: Find yourself at the heart of every movie and series. 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray shows everything in finer detail than ever before, so you feel like you’re seeing the real thing.

product.title: Naim SUPERNAIT 2 Amplifier
product.description: The Naim SUPERNAIT 2 combines a muscular 80 Watts per channel Power Amplifier with six analogue inputs. In terms of both performance and hardware, it is conceptually as close as it is possible to get to separate Pre and Power Amps in one box.

product.description: Q750 is the intermediate model for the Q Series floorstanders.

product.description: The NODE 2 player brings the BluOS™ operating system to your existing stereo system, or a pair of powered speakers, allowing you to tap into a totally new world of digital music discovery.

product.title: Sony SRS-XB31 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
product.description: With EXTRA BASS™, party lights, speakers that replicate the sound of live music and fun features to get the party going, you can feel like you're at a festival, anywhere and at any time.

product.title: Pioneer N-30AE Network Audio Player
product.description: Network player with integrated dual-band Wi-Fi, Airplay, gapless streaming, high-resolution and DSD capability, TuneIn Internet radio and brilliant 3.5" TFT display

product.title: NAD C 556 Turntable
product.description: With a minimalist design, the C 556 Turntable offers accurate reproduction of vinyl music by using performance-focused parts and components that put music first.

product.title: Audio Technica AT-LP3 Turntable
product.description: Fully automatic belt-drive stereo turntable with universal tonearm & headshell
